sen.e: The term akuto first appeared in historical materials as 'Jusen akuto' in the oracle in the May 21, 716 section of "Shoku-Nihongi" (the second in a series of chronicles about Japan), but the second appearance is in the 'Senbuanko bunsho funshitsu joan' ('占部安光文書紛失状案') (March 21, 1165) in the late twelfth century, which is much later in history.
